Chapter.Title: Practice Exercise 4-7: Function with two arguments
Chapter.Data: A built-in function in Python is range that is used for generating a sequence of numbers. This function can take 1, 2, or even 3 arguments. For example, range(5, 10) generates a list of numbers starting at 5 and ending at 9. The second argument to the function will never be a part of the sequence. Write a statement using range to generate the list 10, 11, 12, 13, 14 and display it.
